Type.BattleDialog: What a cute cluster of adorable little squirts~
Let us end this at a breath.
If you insist on beating us so badly… Everyone, let us prepare ourselves.
I hope this taught you a good lesson.
This wouldn’t have happened had you just tucked your tails and surrendered… Sigh, what a pity.
If only that bitchhead didn’t interfere with our business…
Tsk. This is the strength of a nebbish who swore to protect me?
This won’t do… You haven’t fully served your role yet.
It seems the situation is headed to a rather worrying direction.
You should’ve packed up and quit this occupation if you were so inept.
You looked rather impatient~ Were you unnerved, perhaps?
That was quite underwhelming for such a notorious faction.
I’ll handle that one.
They don’t appear to be easy opponents.
Even if we’re evenly matched, we should stay alert till the end.
I’m drained of all my energy after getting into two tough fights in a day.
Let’s head back now. It seems we’ve taken care of them all.
…My ineptitude is to blame. I’m sorry about this.
We could’ve avoided dying a dog’s death like this.
We’ve lost some vigor dealing with that ordeal outside… I suppose we had too little left to handle this one.
I don’t want to see anyone else fall behind.
You tried to stop me with such little strength?
You should’ve known your place.
It’s unfortunate, but it’s time you gave up.
Hooh~ Man, I’m tired.
When will I get to stop covering myself in dirty bloodstains?
No good can come from getting flustered like that~
Now I get why that whelp sent us here. Saw a lot of weird things.
You’re so frail, I can’t stand to watch it.
Blast… Do you even know what happens if you treat Kurokumo like this…?
That… was pretty sharp. I’d better watch out for it.
No way. We’re being overpowered by those scumbags?
No good can come from losing our forces one by one…
Hah, I left myself open more often than I wanted, too.
We aren’t doing this as a joke, y’know.
Wasn’t even worth dodging.
I won’t let them lay a blade on Madame Sayo.
Start a fight against us Kurokumo… You’re pretty gutsy, I’ll give you that.
We’ll be moving first. Be prepared, everyone…
I think we can consider it a success.
Can’t wait to wash off all this blood in a nice hot bath.
I never thought… I’d make such a mistake…
R—Run, dame. Something’s not right about this place…
Another one fell… This isn’t good.
That sent chills down my spine. Dammit… This is scaring me.
We could use a bit more caution as we proceed.
You were rather skilled… But you were rash at the last moment.
I won’t let all of you get away.
